alert.note: Alert for Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 25 at 5:49AM EDT until September 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Richmond (Staten Island) County. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor coastal flooding possible again on Tuesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT KILLS HARBOR AT GREAT KILLS NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.2 FT, MAJOR 9.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/05 AM 5.6/ 6.1 0.2/ 0.7 1.0/ 1.5 1-2 NONE 25/05 PM 7.1/ 7.6 1.7/ 2.2 1.5/ 2.0 1-2 MINOR 26/06 AM 7.0/ 7.5 1.6/ 2.0 2.0/ 2.5 2 MINOR 26/06 PM 7.4/ 7.9 2.0/ 2.5 1.5/ 2.0 2 MINOR 27/07 AM 6.6/ 7.1 1.2/ 1.7 1.1/ 1.6 2 NONE 27/07 PM 7.0/ 7.5 1.6/ 2.0 0.9/ 1.4 2 MINOR KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.5 FT, MAJOR 9.6 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/05 AM 5.5/ 6.0 0.0/ 0.5 0.8/ 1.3 1 NONE 25/05 PM 7.2/ 7.7 1.7/ 2.2 1.4/ 1.9 1 MINOR 26/06 AM 6.9/ 7.4 1.4/ 1.9 1.8/ 2.2 1 NONE 26/06 PM 7.5/ 8.0 2.0/ 2.5 1.4/ 1.9 1 MINOR 27/07 AM 6.5/ 7.0 1.0/ 1.5 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 27/07 PM 7.0/ 7.5 1.5/ 2.0 0.7/ 1.1 1 MINOR &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
